signature.instructions:
Classify text into a label from the given candidates.

Given original content, its summary, and a rubric describing what to preserve,
determine which label best describes the content/summary pair.

fields.description: The original text content before summarization
The summary of the original content
Description of what information should be preserved in the summary
Candidate labels to choose from, with descriptions
Similar examples for reference (may be empty)
Step-by-step reasoning about why this label applies
The predicted label (must be one of the candidates)
Confidence score from 0.0 to 1.0 (as a number)
